price: Sε yεfrε wͻn kͻ Nyankopͻn ne Ne Somafoͻ no hͻ sεdeε (yεde Qur’aan) bebu wͻn ntεm atεn a, wobehunu sε wͻn mu fekuo bi atwi afa soͻ.
arabic: وَإِذَا دُعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ لِيَحۡكُمَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā duʿū ilā al-lahi warasūlihi liyaḥkuma baynahum idhā farīqun min'hum muʿ'riḍūna
